Class PlotWindow

java.lang.Object

                      org.LiveGraph.gui.PlotWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, CacheObserver, SettingsObserver
public class PlotWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements CacheObserver, SettingsObserver

The plot window of the application.
